attributes.action: "Bring back dead penalty, anyone who kills should be killed and increase sentencing for gun/knife carrier; this should apply to any age.".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Uk today is not a safe place to live, the government is too soft on its law, Parent feel they are no longer in charge of their children's decipline,due to goverment legislations. Gun crime has worsen over the years, with no clear agenda of tackling it but i strongly believe that if the law is revised and people kowing they cannot get away with commiting crime, there will be a massive reduction/improvement in our society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
